Text: Before you all go out and buy your 3-D glasses to watch this special, be aware that regardless of the title, there is no 3-D footage whatsoever. So put away your Avatar, Saw VI, or Chuck glasses, all the title is referring to is that this is not an animation episode, it is a "Making Of" "Documentary" so you get to see 3Dimensional people (in 2D) talking about the first 20 years of The Simpsons. Also there is nothing On Ice either, so I don't know what that is supposed to refer to at all. The nearest I can figure is either the narrator is On Ice, or they recommend the viewer be On Ice to make this watchable. Actually, being On Ice and wearing 3-D glasses may actually make this documentary more interesting...
EZTV is back! Yay! Thank you so much for this torrent.
jonmobrien: you spoke too soon regarding the "on ice" bit... ;-)
